author: TheBooks

review: I wish I had read some of the reviews. This came quickly and will possibly work on my netbook. I bought this intending to use with my ipad. Wish I had read the reviews. As my daughter purchased one and loves it, I decide to get one for myself. She has a Mac though and it works great with that. The mobile app for chrome for the ipad does not support the chromecast. Wasn't aware of that. :( My netbook is slow so the streaming for this might now work well. Will have to test it out. I have a smart TV so I don't need this for netflix or any other apps that I can access on my TV. Will probably keep this so if my daughter will let me use her Mac I can access sites via chrome. Hopefully there will be an update for mobile chrome that will allow us to use this on the ipad.
